name: Treasure and Llama
description:
There’s no better place to seek for adventure and ancient treasures than a dense, monstrosity-ridden Andean jungle! Through your journey you will have to face the most remarkable of the indigenous lifeforms… and preferably avoid some stupid ways to die. 

Godspeed on your journey - and don’t get eaten! 

Music by Kevin MacLeod at https://incompetech.com/.

All of the pictures in this game do not belong to me and are on CC license.
